turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. I've been trying to call for days, but I keep getting stuck on hold. It's so frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can certainly help you schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. Could you please provide me with your full name and date of birth for verification?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's Jane Doe, and my birthday is 01/15/1988. What appointment times are available next week?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, Jane Doe. Let me check Dr. Ramirez's availability for next week. I see a couple of options: Monday at 10:00 AM, Wednesday at 2:30 PM, or Friday at 9:00 AM. Which one works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, those all sound pretty bad. Is there any way to be put on a cancellation list? And, out of curiosity, why is it so difficult to get an appointment with Dr. Ramirez? Is she leaving the practice or something?
